creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Pot in the form of a Seated Figure,polychrome earthenware,Mexico, Casas Grandes,XIIc. Red, black, and brown on cream slip. Pierced eyes, open mouth, incomplete head, applique arms.
text:
Paquimé (Casas Grandes)
Chihuahua, Mexico
Vessel in the Form of a Man, 12th-13th century
Ceramic, pigment
The John R. Van Derlip Fund     83.90.3
title: Vessel in the Form of a Man
